credit_line: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
title: The Ghost in the Underblows by Alfred Young Fisher
description:
Pages 262-263. Left page: text header: XV followed by 35 lines of text, page number 262 in lower left. 
Right page:abstract geometrical pattern in black, white and red. Pattern consists of: a vertical rectangle outlined in black with band of black lines running length. Red vertical rectangle made of smaller rectangles behind this, with a black vertical rectangle along left side. Final rectangle placed in front of all, is divided in half, one side white in center with red border divided into rectangles, other white on border with red center of squares divided into equilateral triangles. horizontal rectangle of black circles (3 long x 4 wide) in center.
name: Book
